mainText:
Steve Jobs,

You have inspired me to be Innovative and be Ingenious.

You also have made me realized that people would see a person who
crazy in the beginning, but in the long run, that person will be a
great impression on society. This has been proven throughout history
with Albert Einstein and many other. And you are in the league of
Geniuses.

Thank you for connecting the world. Thank you for sharing the
inspirations. Thank you for making me believe in myself. Thank you
Sir.

May you Rest In Peace. My condolences goes to your family and Apple.
May you be remembered as the iGod of the Tech World.
author: Aneel
